title: Numazu, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar UL edge; ULQ
description: three travelers making their way down a narrow wooded path; man in back wears all white and carries a large box on his back with a red demon face; village scene with arched bridge in background; river to L; moon rising in horizon
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
